mention.text: the race for the Russian presidency
newspaper allegations that front-runner Boris Yeltsin is emotionally unstable
an article published in Pravda , the Soviet Communist Party newspaper
the cycle of smear and recrimination
a runoff with his main opponent , former Soviet Prime Minister Nikolai Ryzhkov
former Soviet Prime Minister Nikolai Ryzhkov
The main feature of Boris Nikolayevich 's personality
his excessive need for power , '' the professors wrote.
